review: took the place of my apple tv for a fraction of the cost.
author: Shelton Holmes

review: It is even better than I expected. A great value for the cost.
author: Carol A. Lassila "knitting maven"

review: So far so good,  I am just getting used to using it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This was a great gift - I can access things I never even thought about and it was seamless & easy to get started!
author: kc anderson

review: I come from having AppleTV for the last 5 years or so. I am very satisfied with my fire stick.  It installed in TV and WiFi easily. There is plenty of stuff pre-loaded to play around with for free.  But I have to say this has pushed to get Prime and enjoy the full capabilities of my Stick.  Oh,  and a game controller too.
author: Tommy
